mapper.select: select g.id, g.guild_no as guildNo, g.name, g.logo_url as logoUrl, g.president_uid as presidentUid, g.create_time as createTime, (select sum(tr.gold) from guild_daily_turnover_report tr where g.id=tr.guild_id and DATE_FORMAT(tr.report_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) as gold from guild g where g.is_del = false group by g.id, g.guild_no, g.name, g.logo_url, g.president_uid, g.create_time order by gold desc limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}

select g.id, g.guild_no as guildNo, g.name, g.logo_url as logoUrl, g.president_uid as presidentUid, g.create_time as createTime, (select count(*) from guild_hall h where h.is_del=false and h.guild_id=g.id) as hallCount, (select count(*) from guild_hall_member m where m.is_del=false and m.guild_id=g.id) as memberCount, sum(tr.gold) as gold from guild g left join guild_daily_turnover_report tr on g.id=tr.guild_id where g.is_del = false and hall_id is null and tr.member_id is null and g.id=#{id} group by g.id, g.guild_no, g.name, g.logo_url, g.president_uid, g.create_time

select g.id, g.guild_no as guildNo, g.name, g.logo_url as logoUrl, g.president_uid as presidentUid, g.create_time as createTime from guild g where g.is_del = false and (g.guild_no like #{search_key} or g.name like #{search_key})
